Whenever a permanent you control phases in, target player mills two cards.

When Draconic Invasion enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 4/4 red Dragon Alien creature token with flying, haste, and “this creature attacks each turn if able”.

When Elusive Trickster enters, target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever one or more creatures deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

City-Wide Rampager gets +X/+X, where X is your high score.
{2}{G}: Choose one –
• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Target creature gains score until end of turn. [i](When the amount of damage dealt to opponents in a turn by sources you control with score exceeds your high score, it becomes your new high score.)[/i]
Until end of turn, whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player copies it and may choose new targets for the copy.

Choose two target creature cards in graveyards. Return one of them to the battlefield, then merge the other under it. [i](A merged creature has all attributes of the creature card on top plus all abilities of creature cards under it.)[/i]

Whenever Holo-Squad Captain deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Holo-Squad Captain.
When Holo-Squad Captain dies, if it isn't a token, you may exile it encoded on a creature you control. Holo-Squad Captain gains cipher for as long as it remains exiled.

Chrome Invader gets +1/+1 for each card encoded on it and each modification on it. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
Whenever Chrome Invader attacks, if its power is 5 or greater, it gains trample until end of turn. If its power is 10 or greater, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them until the end of your next turn. If its power is 20 or greater, it deals 20 damage to any target.

Saturate [i](As you cast this spell, for each color of mana spent to cast it, it becomes that color in addition to its other colors.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell that shares one or more colors with Technocolor Palette, put that many charge counters on Technocolor Palette.
{T}, Remove X charge counters from Technocolor Palette: Create an X/X Elemental creature token that's all colors. Activate only as a sorcery.
If a creature dealing combat damage to a player causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control or a card you own to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Flash
Ledrano gets +1/+1 for each phased out permanent.
When Ledrano enters, until end of turn, permanents enter phased out.

Score [i](When the amount of damage dealt to opponents in a turn by sources you control with score exceeds your high score, it becomes your new high score.)[/i]
Trample, haste
When Hunted Bounty Hunter enters, target opponent creates three 1/1 red Dragon Alien creature tokens with flying.

Whenever you attack, defending player gains control of Power Ball and put a point counter on it.
Whenever you are attacked or one or more creatures deal combat damage to you, put a point counter on Power Ball.
Whenever there are five or more counters on Power Ball, sacrifice it, then Power Ball's owner and each opponent draws two cards and creates two treasure tokens.
{2}, {T}: Put a point counter on Power Ball. Activate only as a sorcery.

Score [i](When the amount of damage dealt to opponents in a turn by sources you control with score exceeds your high score, it becomes your new high score.)[/i]
As long as your high score is 2 or greater, Reality Breaker can't be blocked.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Understanding how reality works is the first step to breaking it.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Data Transferer enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. If an opponent lost life this turn, draw two cards instead.
